channel.title: Does anyone have any undiscovered glitches?
channel.description: I would like know if anyone has undiscovered glitches, if so, I would like to know them. if you are wondering why im starting this thread, im horribly bored, i can bypass ip bans, and i'm bord.

item.title: Does anyone have any undiscovered glitches?
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

lol i tested it, if you bring a candle you could just walk around(you see nothing, and your minimap is a bunch of white and black lines, but i figure that is you bring runes, you can tele out

note took me 5 lifes to make it there on a lvl 3 and about 4 tries to make it in this holy thingy.

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone have any undiscovered glitches?

item.title: Does anyone have any undiscovered glitches?
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

[quote=“ipl0x, post:13, topic:3686”]I have one, not sure if it still works though.

  1. go all the way up to the highest winderness for f2p.
  2. go to the ice giant pleace.
  3. “run” straight at the corner.
  4. you shall be stuck in utter darkness for the rest of your accounts days, well until jagex fix’s that glitch.[/quote]

Does this really work? if so cool, does that meen that you could attack people init or see people that are actually inside underground or overground buildings, cool

som3on3 t35t pl0)(

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone have any undiscovered glitches?

item.title: Does anyone have any undiscovered glitches?
item.dc:creator: @ipl0x ipl0x
item.description:
@ipl0x wrote:

I have one, not sure if it still works though.

  1. go all the way up to the highest winderness for f2p.
  2. go to the ice giant pleace.
  3. “run” straight at the corner.
  4. you shall be stuck in utter darkness for the rest of your accounts days, well until jagex fix’s that glitch.

item.title: Does anyone have any undiscovered glitches?

item.description:
@jme wrote:

Yeah well actually it explains this on tutorial island

I mean, it’s obvious they added it in, it’s no glitch. Anyways, if someone knows a private glitch they are not going to tell you.

Although, then again there is athat bug where you drop your items and press alt+f4
